findings.message: useEffect for syncing agentStatus to TabContext has exhaustive-deps lint warning: 'agentStatus.status' is referenced via optional chaining on primitive fields but the parent object is not in deps. Functionally correct but generates a warning.
findings.suggestion: Either add agentStatus.status to deps array (and adjust condition) or suppress with eslint-disable-next-line

findings.message: RUNNING_STATUSES and ERROR_STATUSES are defined in both TabBar.tsx and useTabNotification.ts, creating duplication.
findings.suggestion: Extract shared status sets to tab-storage.ts or a shared constants file.

findings.message: TabNotificationMount component is defined in a hooks file. Per project convention, components should be in components/ directory.
findings.suggestion: Move TabNotificationMount to components/ or keep as-is since it's a headless mount component.

findings.message: hoverTimerRef is not cleaned up via useEffect on component unmount. If component unmounts while timer is pending, stale state setter will be called (no-op in React 18, but not idiomatic).
findings.suggestion: Add useEffect(() => () => { if (hoverTimerRef.current) clearTimeout(hoverTimerRef.current); }, []) for cleanup.
